name: Postal
summary:
The streets are full of gang members; cops are just venal cowards, not upholding law and order in the city. Degenerate officials live on bribes and won’t lift a finger to make things better.

Like it? Hey dude, I’ve got news for you – one good, and one bad. The bad news is that just a few minutes ago your car got hijacked. The good news is that it’s time to go berserk and take things in your own hands. Justice will be served!
